findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions may be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has extensive control over various aspects of the contract, including wallets, trading status, and fees.
findings.location: Various functions in the Meta Hangry Games token contract (only applicable until the owner is renounced)
